document.full_text: thirteen years after the justice department filed an antitrust lawsuit against microsoft, accusing the software giant of using its market power to pummel potential rivals, the case will soon be history.
document.title: microsoft vs u.s. antitrust battle soon to be history
lines_and_colors: thirteen years after the justice department filed an antitrust lawsuit against microsoft, accusing the software giant of using its market power to pummel potential rivals, the case will soon be history.
